DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety MP-424 Peginterferon Alfa-2b ( PEG-IFN ) Ribavirin ( RBV ) patient ( Genotype 1 ) hepatitis C , relapse previous treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety MP-424 , Peginterferon Alfa-2b , Ribavirin Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Who Relapsed After Previous Interferon Based Therapy
DOC.criteria: Genotype 1 , chronic hepatitis C Relapsers ( patient relapse previous treatment ) Able willing follow contraception requirement Cirrhosis liver hepatic failure Hepatitis B surface antigenpositive HIV antibodiespositive History , concurrent hepatocellular carcinoma History , concurrent depression , schizophrenia ; suicide attempt past Pregnant , lactating , suspect pregnant patient , male patient whose female partner pregnant
